title: Ромео і Джульєтта з Черкас
overview: Yulia and Roma are a young couple in love who are about to get married. An unexpected problem complicates the wedding excitement: their parents have had a long-standing enmity since they were young and have many unresolved issues. To get their wedding, future spouses try to reconcile with their fathers, negotiate with their mothers, and pass many more tests from relatives.
